Title: Relates to offering college-level courses at all state-operated correctional facilities in the state
Summary: Mandates that college-level courses be offered at all state-operated correctional facilities with female incarcerated individuals in the state in coordination with the state university of New York, the city university of New York and the independent colleges of New York by 2021 and offered at all other state-operated correctional facilities by 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to offering college-level courses at all state-operated correctional facilities in the state
